title: Field Sales Intern
short: Work with restaurants, handle daily communication, and support sales operations.
description: 1. Connect with restaurants to sell our service.
2. Maintain an Excel sheet for daily tasks.
3. Participate in group discussions for development.
responsibilities: Reach out to restaurants and pitch TheVisu Plate services.
Maintain daily task reports in Excel.
Participate in group discussions and contribute ideas.
Promote and support digital menu adoption.
requirements: Ability to analyze basic business needs
Availability to work from home for 6 months
Women wanting to restart their career can also apply

extra.salary_note: No fixed salary — incentive-based work. Earn up to ₹30,000/month.

title: Frontend Development Intern
short: Build UI for real-world restaurant-tech products using React & Tailwind.
description: We are looking for a frontend development intern to help build smooth, modern, and interactive UIs for TheVisu Plate platform.
You will work closely with the founders to design, build, and improve customer-facing product features.
responsibilities: Develop UI components using React and TailwindCSS
Convert Figma designs into clean, responsive frontend interfaces
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate APIs
Optimize components for performance and speed
Test and debug issues across devices
requirements: Knowledge of responsive and mobile-first design
Ability to learn fast and work independently
